metadata.job_to_be_done: Prepare a vegetarian buffet-style dinner menu for a corporate gathering, including gluten-free items.

subsection_analysis.refined_text:
Title: Vegetarian Buffet-Style Dinner Menu for Corporate Gathering (Including Gluten-Free Options)

1. Appetizers:
   - Quinoa Stuffed Mushrooms (Gluten-free)
   - Hummus Platter with assorted gluten-free crackers, carrot sticks, and bell pepper slices

2. Salads:
   - Greek Quinoa Salad (Gluten-free): A mix of quinoa, cucumber, cherry tomatoes, olives, feta cheese, and a house vinaigrette dressing
   - Spinach and Strawberry Salad (Gluten-free): Fresh spinach leaves tossed with sliced strawberries, toasted almonds, goat cheese, and a balsamic glaze

3. Main Courses:
   - Vegetable Paella (Gluten-free): Saffron rice cooked with bell peppers, zucchini, artichoke hearts, peas, cherry tomatoes, and roasted garlic
   - Stuffed Eggplant Parmesan (Can be made gluten-free upon request)

4. Sides:
   - Gluten-Free Garlic Mashed Potatoes
   - Quinoa Pilaf (Gluten-free)

5. Desserts:
   - Chocolate Avocado Mousse (Vegan and Gluten-free)
   - Fruit Platter (Includes seasonal fruits)

Gluten-free Vegetarian Dessert Ingredients (for a Buffet-Style Corporate Gathering):
• Replace all-purpose flour with a gluten-free flour blend
• Maintain sugar, baking powder, baking soda, and salt quantities as is
• Use dairy-free buttermilk substitute for regular buttermilk
• Keep egg quantity the same
• Substitute melted butter with a plant-based alternative (vegan butter)
• Maintain vanilla extract quantity

Prepare gluten-free pancakes for a buffet-style dinner as follows:

1. In a bowl, combine gluten-free flour blend, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, and salt.
2. In another bowl, whisk together gluten-free buttermilk substitute (such as almond milk with lemon juice or vinegar), an egg, melted vegan butter (or regular butter for non-vegan option), and vanilla extract.
3. Pour the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients and stir until just combined.
4. Heat a non-stick skillet over medium heat and lightly grease it with oil or additional vegan butter.
5. For each pancake, pour 1/4 cup of batter onto the skillet.
6. Cook until bubbles form on the surface, then flip and cook until golden brown.
7. Serve with gluten-free syrup and a variety of toppings (e.g., fresh fruits, berries, nuts, or vegan chocolate chips).

Title: Vegetarian Buffet Menu for Corporate Gathering (Gluten-Free Options)

1. Starter:
   - Quinoa Salad with Mixed Greens, Cherry Tomatoes, Cucumber, Red Onion, Feta Cheese (Dairy-free alternative available upon request), and a Lemon Vinaigrette

2. Main Courses:
   - Spiced Chickpea Curry served over Basmati Rice with Raita sauce on the side (Coconut milk-based; can be made coconut-free if necessary)
   - Stuffed Bell Peppers with Quinoa, Black Beans, Corn, Tomato Salsa, and a sprinkle of Cheddar Cheese (Dairy-free alternative available upon request)

3. Sides:
   - Roasted Sweet Potatoes with Rosemary and Garlic
   - Mixed Green Salad with Balsamic Vinaigrette

4. Dessert:
   - Chocolate Avocado Mousse (Vegan, gluten-free)

5. Beverages:
   - Iced Herbal Tea and Infused Waters (Lemon, Berry, Cucumber, Mint)
   - Selection of Non-Alcoholic Beer and Wine (ensure gluten-free options are available)

Gluten-free Vegan Dessert Ingredients:
- 1 cup gluten-free all-purpose flour (ensure it's a 1:1 baking substitute)
- 2 tablespoons organic cane sugar or alternate vegan sweetener
- 1 teaspoon baking powder (ensure it's aluminum-free and gluten-free)
- 1/2 teaspoon baking soda (ensure it's aluminum-free)
- 1/4 teaspoon salt
- 1 cup dairy-free buttermilk (can be made by combining 1 tablespoon lemon juice with almond milk and letting it sit for 5 minutes)
- 1 large flax egg (1 tablespoon ground flaxseed mixed with 3 tablespoons water, let sit for 5 minutes to gel)
- 2 tablespoons melted vegan butter substitute
- 1 teaspoon vanilla extract
